</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if given unit is turned out, otherwise [[false]]. The output changes to [[true]] after unit finished turning out, however will change to [[false]] almost immediately after unit is ordered to turn in. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isTurnedOut''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit on turn(in/out) enabled turret </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_commanderOut = [[isTurnedOut]] (tank [[turretUnit]] [0,0]);</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[moveOut]], [[moveInDriver]], [[turretUnit]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
